mapper.select: select a.user_no from (select * from srv_usr_mst where email = #{email} and status = '100-002') a join (select * from srv_wrks_mem where wrks_no = #{sess_workspace_no} and status = '100-002') b on a.user_no = b.user_no

select b.username, b.email, if(a.name is null or a.name = '', c.name, a.name) as name from (select * from srv_wrks_mem where wrks_no = #{sess_workspace_no} and status = '100-002') a join srv_usr_mst b on a.user_no = b.user_no join srv_usr_info c on a.user_no = c.user_no

select B.WRKS_NO as workspaceNo, B.USER_NO as userNo, B.AUTH_TP as authType, B.STATUS as status, B.INS_DT AS insertedDate from (select * from srv_wrks_mst where wrks_id = #{workspace_id}) a join srv_wrks_mem b on a.wrks_no = b.wrks_no where b.user_no = #{sess_user_no} and status = '100-001'
